name: Outbreak: Lost Hope - Deluxe Edition DLC
detailed_description:
Experience the nightmare in style with the Deluxe Edition DLC for Outbreak: Lost Hope!

This DLC includes:
  • Gwen's Inferno Effect - Light up the apocalypse as the flames dance off you.
  • Rainbow Flashlight & Laser - Turn your flashlight or laser into a beautiful rainbow!
  • Vital Signs Flashlight & Laser - Your flashlight or laser will glow based on your health condition.
  • Treasure Hunter Flashlight & Laser - Your flashlight or laser will glow gold and light up treasure at greater range.
